attributes.action: Repeal the sus law and take the right away from police officers in the U.K.
attributes.additional_details: Get rid of the sus law and take the right of being able to violate civilians without a warrant and evidence away from police officers.
attributes.background: Eradicate the sus law to stop police officers using stereotypes to violate civilians. To only be able to arrest or stop and search people with a warrant and evidence.
